p: Molecular docking was performed for determining binding modes of the ligands using Auto-Dock Vina software ( 12). The binding site residues of InhA with grid center at X:12.832, Y:16.388, Z: 6.306 and the number of points in each dimension as X:20, Y:20, Z:20 and Spacing (Ã…): 1.0 were originated from a previous study ( 13). Binding site residues and grid box of InhA were shown in Fig. 2. In order to show interactions between ligand and receptor Discovery Studio Visualizer v4.5 was used.
